javadoc: Command to set a specific type of comment on a code unit.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of code unit where comment will be placed

methods.name: commentChanged
methods.comment: return true if the newValue and oldValue are different

params.name: newValue
params.comment: a String containing the new comment

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: a String containing the old comment

return.comment: true if newValue and oldValue are different.

methods.javadoc:
Get the code unit from the program location provider.
@return CodeUnit null if there is no location provider.
methods.name: getCodeUnit
methods.comment: Get the code unit from the program location provider.

return.comment: CodeUnit null if there is no location provider.

methods.name: createComment
methods.comment:
Creates the specified comment of the specified type at address.  The current comment of
 this commentType will be cleared.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address where data is created

params.name: commentType
params.comment:
the type of comment (CodeUnit#PLATE_COMMENT, 
 CodeUnit#PRE_COMMENT, CodeUnit#EOL_COMMENT, CodeUnit#POST_COMMENT,
 CodeUnit#REPEATABLE_COMMENT)

name: SetCommentCmd
comment: Command to set a specific type of comment on a code unit.
